text.content: Center of Tokyo-3.
One week later...
~player~! I'm so glad you could came here!
Y-Yeah... I know I got pretty drunk that night...
And I probably made an ass of myself.
But I remember what I said to you and I don't regret it.
I'm not ashamed to say that I like you.
I said it...
I-I understand if you don't feel the same way about a drunk lazy woman like me...
W-What? Y-You don't mind?
Even after you saw my scar?
That...That's so sweet of you, ~player~.
I was thinking...
Since Shinji and Asuka are out with their syncro test...
You and I could have a more private time.
You said yes?
You wanna do it?
Let's go to my room!
Come on, ~player~!
Don't you wanna become one with me?
I'm so glad you came back for the rest, ~name~.
